definition: Jeremy Lin (1988-), Taiwanese-American professional basketball player (NBA)
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: As for the future, Lin wants to make sure he ends up in the right situation.
sentences.chinese: 對於未來，林書豪希望能夠以正確的方式結束。

sentences.english: Hell, he could've been balling WITH Lin a couple of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我去，姚明確實本該在幾年前和林書豪一個隊打球。

sentences.english: Lin caught the hoops bug from his father Gie-Ming.
sentences.chinese: 林書豪是從他父親林傑明那裏開始接觸籃球的。

sentences.english: The type of dude I am, I might not be as mature as Jeremy.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣的人，可能不會像林書豪那麼成熟。

sentences.english: Yes, that's one reason Lin is a novelty.
sentences.chinese: 是的，這是林書豪與衆不同的原因之一。

sentences.english: At the gym now, it's Jeremy Lin.
sentences.chinese: 現在在健身房，大家說你是林書豪。

sentences.english: Lin was on the injured list for Houston that night.
sentences.chinese: 當晚，林書豪在籃網隊的傷員名單中。

definition: Yi Jianlian (1987-), Chinese basketball player for the New Jersey Nets (NBA)
Phelps (name)/Michael Phelps (1985-), US swimmer and multiple Olympic gold medallist
treasure knife does not age (idiom); old but still vigorous
to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
